mentionedBy.name: SentinelOne Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Best overall SentinelOne XDR alternative. Cutting-edge cybersecurity platform leveraging AI, state-of-the-art technologies, and human expertise. Cloud-first XDR solution integrating unique threat intelligence for next-gen prevention, detection, and proactive threat hunting. Includes comprehensive MDR services.
